LanguageData.VCE_CookBakeLavish.description: Cook two masterpieces of the culinary arts, these bakes nourish the body, mind, and soul.

LanguageData.VCE_CookBakeGourmet.label: cook gourmet bake x2
LanguageData.VCE_CookBakeGourmet.description: Cook two culinary works of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity bake.\n\nThis recipe does not allow mixed ingredients.
